title: Non-stop cremations cast doubt on India's counting of Covid dead
content:
1. Non-stop cremations cast doubt on India's counting of Covid dead  CNN
  2. Covid Crisis | What Went Wrong With India? What Do We Need To Do To Get Through This?  India Today
  3. India's COVID tsunami leaves bodies piling up as oxygen, medicines, vaccines and hospital beds run short  CBS News
  4. India's Surging Case Count Will Make the Pandemic More Deadly This Year  Bloomberg
  5. Delhi Lockdown 2.0: Capital Reports 23686 Fresh Cases And Recorded 240 Deaths In Last 24 Hours  India Today

localize.title: 絶え間なく続く火葬は、インドのCovid死者数のカウントに疑問を投げかける。
不停的火化使人们对印度计算科维德的死亡人数产生怀疑
不停的火化使人們對印度計算科維德的死亡人數產生懷疑
